          <title>
            <string language="fi">Kylmävesiallas</string>
            <string language="en">Cold water pool</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pool des kalten Wassers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Regroupement d'eau froide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pool da água fria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Stagno dell'acqua fredda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λίμνη κρύου νερού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Piscina de la agua fría</string>
          </title>
          <language>fi</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fi">Viivapiirros, joka esittää uimahallin kylmävesiallasta.</string>
            <string language="en">Line drawing of a cold water pool at a swimming pool.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fi">kylmävesiallas</string>
            <string language="fi">uimahallit</string>
            <string language="fi">altaat</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeichnen Sie Zeichnung eines Pools des kalten 
Wassers an einem Swimmingpool.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rayez le schéma d'un regroupement d'eau froide à
une piscine.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Alinhe o desenho de um pool da água fria em um 
pool de natação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Allinei l'illustrazione di uno stagno dell'acqua 
fredda ad una piscina.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο γραμμών μιας λίμνης κρύου νερού σε μια 
πισίνα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Alinee el gráfico de una piscina de la agua fría
en una piscina.</string>
          </description>
        </general>
